payload.text: Remeber, if you can find and talk to all of our Red Bull F1 race team members, you can win VIP-access to the Monaco Coctail Club 2016!

text: Hello! My name is Max Verstappen.
I was born in Hasselt, Belgium and I have been driving ever since I was 6 years old. Is this your first time at the races?
I always enjoy racing street circuits like Monaco because you are really pushing the limit and are very close to the walls.
To prepare for this year, I took part in the Red Bull Soapbox Race. http://www.redbull.com/en/motorsports/f1/stories/1331724434998/max-verstappen-red-bull-soapbox
How did I do in your opinion?
Samuel, you have done now all it takes to be part of the lottery of VIP-access to the Monaco Coctail Club 2016! Please give me your email address and I'll let you know the winner at 21:00.

payload.text: And by the way, if you want I can keep on telling you some stuff about the event, like lap times and who is on the lead.
